name: Exploration in Clay
description: Explore the myriad of sculptural potential in clay. We will cover basic ceramic hand-building, wheel thrown forms, surface decorations and glazing. The instructor will work with advanced students to explore and develop individual techniques and projects. All levels welcome.
fullDescription: Explore the myriad of sculptural potential in clay. We will cover basic ceramic hand-building, wheel thrown forms, surface decorations and glazing. The instructor will work with advanced students to explore and develop individual techniques and projects. All levels welcome.
whatTheyOffer: Explore the myriad of sculptural potential in clay. We will cover basic ceramic hand-building, wheel thrown forms, surface decorations and glazing. The instructor will work with advanced students to explore and develop individual techniques and projects. All levels welcome.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
keywords: i am between 18 and 24 years old.
i am over 24 years old without children.
